example_ka: კეთილი იყოს თქვენი მობრძანება ჩვენს სახლში.

example_en: Are you coming to the party?
Send my greetings to your family.
Can you do me a favor?
Can I give you some advice?
Excuse me, where is the exit?
He kissed her on the cheek.
Learn how to interact with people.
He has a lot of influence.
Table etiquette is important at formal dinners.
